backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing an update to landingImages.ts to use GitHub raw URLs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to their short descriptions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the LandingPage component as the root app.
frontend/src/components/cta/BuyNowButton: Gradient-styled CTA button redirecting users to the affiliate URL.
frontend/src/components/landing/sections: Benefits grid with icons plus two supporting images each followed by a Buy Now button.
Accordion-based FAQ section driven by structured copy.
Footer with modal dialogs for Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions and basic copyright info.
Hero section with trust badges, headline, product image, two CTA buttons, and star rating.
Three-step explanation of how the product works with numbered icons.
Ingredients section with product image, Buy Now button, and feature cards with icons.
Problem description section with three issue cards using alert-style icons.
Displays the solution section with headline, product image, buy button, and a list of benefits using solutionCopy.
Renders a strong call‑to‑action block with product image, urgency message, and multiple Buy Now buttons.
Shows a testimonials grid with ratings, quotes, author info, and a supporting image with a buy button.
Displays trust and safety features with icons plus product trust badges.
frontend/src/constants/affiliate.ts: Defines the affiliate purchase URL and CTA button label.
frontend/src/constants/landingImages.ts: Exports centralized URLs for all landing page images.
frontend/src/content/provadentCopy.ts: Contains all static marketing copy for the landing page including hero, problem, solution, benefits, steps, and ingredients text blocks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity with login, logout, identity loading, and status handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and CSS variables for theming, including light/dark mode and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the full landing page by composing all section components in order within a styled container.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, and extended theme options using plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current build state, requirements, constraints, issues, and image-related architectural notes.
